name: Fog Gun
description:
Shooting Zombies, but you can't see!

Ha!

Survive for as many days as you can, thats basically how scores work in this thing

Features:
*twin stick shooter
*fog, aka day night cycle, aka slenderman dark darkly darkness

v6 - added tutorial
v5 - removed lag from cloning (deleting clones is broken and doesnt free space)

I wanna update this game with more enemies, guns and locations, but its hard to expand games in pocketcode
